name: Trucks Jump - Crazy Cars and Vehicles Adventure Game
name_original: Trucks Jump - Crazy Cars and Vehicles Adventure Game
description:
Trucks Jump is a fun drive and race game.

Drive your car and collect stars.
Avoid the police cars !

How to Play -
* Tap to Jump
* Double tap to jump higher
* Collect Stars
* Avoid police cars !

Collect enough stars and you can upgrade the appearance of your car and unlock new trucks.


----------------------------------------------------------------
This game contains In-App purchasing which allows you to buy stars which can be spent on upgrading your car. Stars can also be collected in game without requiring purchase.

This game contains advertising. Advertising can be disabled by purchasing remove ads.
